satellite.heading: Satellite so a wɔde di dwuma
satellite.specs:
Nsusuwii: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube na ɛwɔ hɔ
Nneɛma a emu duru yɛ: 245 gr
Nneɛma a wɔde yɛ: aluminium, sika kɔkɔɔ, fiberglass, ne ɛlɛtrɔnik nneɛma.
Akwantuo: Ne sorokɔ yɛ 525 ± 25 km; sɛnea ɛkɔ fam: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°

antenna.heading: Antenna/Nneɛma a Wɔde Yɛ Nneɛma
antenna.specs:
Nsusuwii: 6 m (ne kɛse) e 1.2m (ɔsorokɔ) .
Ne mu duru: kilogram 46
Nneɛma a wɔde yɛ: aluminium, epoxy ahwehwɛ board, sika kɔkɔɔ aluminium dome a wɔde sɛn scaffolding nhyehyɛe mu.

radio.heading: Radio so Nsɛm a Wɔakyerɛw NASA-Catalog:
radio.specs:
TBD Nkitahodi a ɛkɔ fam: 437 MHz
Frɛ: Gyinabea: NHYEHYƐE A ƐWƆ 2025 HO
